languages.text: {n}Наконец, пленник чуть поворачивается, безошибочно находя взглядом наблюдательных сервиторов Номос.{/n} "И у тебя я тоже прошу прощения, великий дух. Я не имел желания осквернить твой храм".

{n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."
languages.original_text: {n}Наконец, пленник чуть поворачивается, безошибочно находя взглядом наблюдательных сервиторов Номос.{/n} "И у тебя я тоже прошу прощения, великий дух. Я не имел желания осквернить твой храм".

traits.locale_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, O great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, O great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}囚人は少し横を向くとまっすぐにノモスの注意深いサーヴィターを見た。{/n}「そしてもちろん、あなたにも許しを請わなくてはならない。偉大なる精霊よ。あなたの神殿の神聖さを損なうのは私の本意ではなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人は少し横を向くとまっすぐにノモスの注意深いサーヴィターを見た。{/n}「そしてもちろん、あなたにも許しを請わなくてはならない。偉大なる精霊よ。あなたの神殿の神聖さを損なうのは私の本意ではなかった」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}随后，囚犯稍微转过身，直视着诺莫斯用来观察的机仆。{/n}“当然，我也必须请求你的原谅，伟大的机魂。亵渎你的神殿并非我的本意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，囚犯稍微转过身，直视着诺莫斯用来观察的奴工。{/n}“当然，我也必须请求你的原谅，伟大的机魂。亵渎你的神殿并非我的本意。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Dann dreht der Gefangene sich leicht um und blickt direkt auf Nomos' beobachtende Servitoren.{/n} "Und natürlich muss ich Euch um Vergebung bitten, großer Geist. Es war nicht meine Absicht, Euren Tempel zu entweihen."
languages.original_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dann dreht der Gefangene sich leicht um und blickt direkt auf Nomos' beobachtende Servitoren.{/n} "Und natürlich muss ich Euch um Vergebung bitten, großer Geist. Es war nicht meine Absicht, Euren Tempel zu entweihen."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Le prisonnier se tourne alors vers les servitors de Nomos qui l'observent.{/n} « Et bien sûr, je vous supplie de m'accorder votre pardon, grand esprit. Je n'avais nullement l'intention de profaner votre temple. »
languages.original_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prisonnier se tourne alors vers les servitors de Nomos qui l'observent.{/n} « Et bien sûr, je vous supplie de m'accorder votre pardon, grand esprit. Je n'avais nullement l'intention de profaner votre temple. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Luego el prisionero vuelve ligeramente la cabeza y mira a los expectantes servidores de Nomos.{/n} «Y por supuesto, debo suplicar tu perdón, gran espíritu. No era mi intención profanar tu templo».
languages.original_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."

traits.locale_text: {n}Luego el prisionero vuelve ligeramente la cabeza y mira a los expectantes servidores de Nomos.{/n} «Y por supuesto, debo suplicar tu perdón, gran espíritu. No era mi intención profanar tu templo».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Mahkûm, hemen ardından hafifçe dönerek doğrudan Nomos'un gözlemci hizmetörlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Pek tabii ki sizin affınız için de yakarmalıyım yüce ruh. Niyetim tapınağınızın kutsallığına leke sürmek değildi."
languages.original_text: {n}Then the prisoner turns slightly and looks straight at Nomos's observing servitors.{/n} "And of course, I must beg forgiveness from you, great spirit. It was not my intent to desecrate your temple."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mahkûm, hemen ardından hafifçe dönerek doğrudan Nomos'un gözlemci hizmetörlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Pek tabii ki sizin affınız için de yakarmalıyım yüce ruh. Niyetim tapınağınızın kutsallığına leke sürmek değildi."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
